# JSON to Pydantic Converter

## Description
This tool converts JSON data into Python Pydantic models. It is designed to help developers quickly generate data models from API responses or other JSON sources.

## Features
- **Smart Type Detection**: Automatically detects types including dates and datetimes.
- **Nested Structures**: Handles deeply nested JSON objects and arrays.
- **CamelCase to Snake_Case**: Optional conversion of field names to Pythonic snake_case with Pydantic aliases.
- **Optional Fields**: Option to make all fields optional.
- **Client-Side Processing**: All conversion happens in the browser; no data is sent to the server.

## Usage
1. Paste JSON into the left panel.
2. Click "Generate Pydantic Model".
3. Copy the generated Python code from the right panel.

## URL
https://jsontopydantic.dev
